column5: I was wondering if anybody knew if the rock tunnel was accessable at GRL. I had heard that in mid June that the water was to high and that you had to portage. Anybody been there lately? Thanks....Mark

The last post on the tunnel was, due to high water levels it had now become a portage lake. Give them a call or e-mail and try the search function at the top of the page! Good luck and let us know what you "hear"!
